title: New ranked idea
body:
So Ive noticed that whenever i play ranked these days, i always find people who get auto filled and are begging for the role they wanted, and that causes a throw in the long run, and everyone's mad.

what im suggesting is that instead of autofill, everyone picks a role or 2 they DONT want, and they randomly get one of the roles.

an example would be that i dont like playing jungle or adc, so i would opt those out, so i would get placed in either top, mid, or supp.

a way this would be good for the community is that it would keep players out of ranked who are one trick ponies that only know how to play one role, and it would inspire them to learn more or hopefully all the roles.

replies.body: This is not a new idea, I've seen this same post like 30 times...(hyperbole yes i know, but still)

The whole point of autofill was that most people didn't want to play support. 

This would bring that back, and we would see people end up complaining about Queue times again.
